headline: A Look at Clorox’s Valuation Following Launch of Screen+ Electronics-Safe Sanitizing Wipes
summary: Clorox (CLX) just rolled out its latest innovation: the Screen+ Sanitizing Wipes, tailored specifically for cleaning and sanitizing sensitive electronics like touchscreens, laptops, and tablets. As devices play a bigger part in offices and schools, so do hygiene demands. Clorox’s new wipes are designed to safely remove bacteria and grime from electronics. This move not only answers growing health concerns, but also shows the brand is paying attention to how technology shapes modern...
